title: Speed Of My Heart
description: After clawing her way out of an abusive relationship, the last thing Mara Campbell is looking for is love. Even after a year, dating seems like a laughable prospect at best. She has no interest in getting wrapped up in another emotionally draining relationship; and that's all Mara ever seems to find when it comes to guys — losers, who seem to suck the life right out of her. No, Mara is much more interested in training relentlessly to pursue a career in dance — and she'll let nothing stand in her way.Cole Davenport is a drop-dead gorgeous professional racecar driver; who's an ace on the track and even better when it comes to driving Mara's heart rate up to top speeds. But, while Mara tries to juggle between advancing her dance career and not losing her heart to a guy who's use to winning; someone else has an entirely different agenda where she's concerned. One that could test the boundaries of her trust and change everything…
author: Erika Trevathan
